posting by agent Post Purchase Orders by Agent
section.para: To post Purchase Orders by Agent, select the "Post Purchase Orders by Agent" option. The following screen will appear:
When posting Purchase Orders by Agent, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to post Purchase Orders for all Purchasing Agents.
Specify Purchasing Agent whose Purchase Orders you want to post.
Users may be designated as Purchasing Agents at the system level.

note.para: Once a Purchase Order has been posted, Line Items can no longer be added to it.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:
